profile:
With over 45 years in business we have built our reputation on offering great floors at a fair price. Floortrends is a Stainmaster Flooring Centre (SFC), a member of the World Floor Covering Association (WFCA), and a member of the National Floorcovering Alliance (NFA), an exclusive group of some of the biggest flooring retailers in North America. Our memberships allow us to find the best products and prices for our customers, and our flooring knowledge ensures you will end up with the right product for your space and the correct installation. Brands we carry include: Midgley & West, Sarana, Ceratec, Olympia, Centura, Mercier, Mirage, Bruce, Armstrong, Satin Flooring, Kraus, Mannington, Shaw, Dixie Masland, Mohawk, Beaulieu, Godfrey Hirst, Cortinear, Interface, Kraus, US Floors, Dura Ceramic, Roxston, and Wicanders. Whether your job is big or small, come visit us today and see how we can help you plan your next project. 

Floortrends has 5 stores to serve you: 

Belleville, ON 613-966-4238 
Bowmanville, ON 905-623-3400 
Cobourg, ON 905-377-9520 
Lindsay, ON 705-324-9481 
Peterborough, ON 705-742-0491

Services Provided
We offer sales and installation of tile (ceramic, porcelain, and natural stone), hardwood, luxury vinyl tile, carpet, wool, sheet vinyl, area rugs, custom runners, cork, backsplash tiles, and commercial flooring.

Areas Served
South Eastern Ontario - Belleville, Bowmanville, Cobourg, Lindsay, Peterborough and surrounding areas.
